name: Starmancer
summary: Obey protocol or go rogue as you take on the role of a powerful A.I. in Starmancer. Build bustling space ports, secret laboratories, and ethically ambiguous human farms. Defend against starvation, sabotage, and space cannibals. Don't worry, you can always grow more humans.
info:
• 发行: Chucklefish
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 开发: Ominux Games
